name: Python
title: Python for Beginners - Learn Programming from scratch
details: Python For Beginners : This course is meant for absolute beginners in programming or in python.

name: C++
title: Beginning C++ Programming - From Beginner to Beyond
details: Obtain Modern C++ Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) and STL skills. C++14 and C++17 covered. C++20 info see below.

name: PHP
title: PHP for Beginners - Become a PHP Master - CMS Project
details: PHP for Beginners: learn everything you need to become a professional PHP developer with practical exercises & projects.

name: Javascript
title: The Complete JavaScript Course 2022: From Zero to Expert!
details: The modern JavaScript course for everyone! Master JavaScript with projects, challenges and theory. Many courses in one!

name: Css
title: CSS - The Complete Guide 2022 (incl. Flexbox, Grid & Sass)
details: Learn CSS for the first time or brush up your CSS skills and dive in even deeper. EVERY web developer has to know CSS.

name: React
title: React - The Complete Guide (incl Hooks, React Router, Redux)
details: Dive in and learn React.js from scratch! Learn Reactjs, Hooks, Redux, React Routing, Animations, Next.js and way more!
